kind: VM
metadata:
  created: "2000-01-01T01:00:00Z"
  name: someVM
  uid: 1699b6ba255cde7f
spec:
  cpus: 0
  diskSize: 0B
  image:
    oci: foo/bar:latest
  kernel:
    oci: foo/bar:latest
  memory: 0B
  network: {}
  sandbox:
    oci: foo/bar:latest
  storage: {}
status:
  idPrefix: ""
  image:
    id: null
    size: 0B
  kernel:
    id: null
    size: 0B
  network:
    ipAddresses: null
    plugin: ""
  running: false
